.@ACPinternists and Annals hosted a second forum focused on gaining acceptance of the #COVID19 vaccines. 

Watch experts @PeterHotez, @AdaAdimora, @helenegayle, and @ProfHeidiLarson discuss how to mitigate #vaccine misinformation and gain public trust https://t.co/H4Mj1Yvtjg. https://t.co/jIAGDbqria
